document_data.mainbody:
Ilzabeth was an erinyes that served Mahadi of the Wandering Emporium in Baator circa the late 15 century DR.
The rakshasa master of the Wandering Emporium could be found on the Avernus in the , following the city of Elturel being plunged into the Nine Hells. Ilzabeth had already been bound to Mahadi by an infernal contract at the time. She was ready to be summoned by her master if a need arose.
